page.title: 08RECREATION
page.content: In Porthleven there is a cricket pitch, a football field, two tennis ourts, a putting green and three parks. In the parks there are swings, slides, roundabouts and goal posts. The tennis courts open only in summer and you can hire tennis racquets if you need to. The putting green which used to be beside the tennis courts was closed last summer but they are opening a new one some time in the future. The cricket pitch used to be an old field. There is quite a big building where the players go to eat or when it rains. You can go and play whenever you like. Some people say that the football field was an old athletics ground until they covered it over with turf. They have a match every Saturday and Sunday.
